##loading packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

##load in all data
```{r}
thisfile=here("data_raw","CU_ACAD_DEPT_WHEN_OFF_ENRL_22740.csv")

df_m = read_csv(thisfile) %>% clean_names()
```

##transform data
```{r}
df_1 = df_m %>% filter(catalog=="131", section <10)
```

##linear regression
```{r}
linear_regression <- lm(term ~ tot_enrl, data = df_1)
summary(linear_regression)
```
